snippet: BALLON--Harriet. The Harmonie Club notes with sorrow the passing of our honored member Harriet Ballon. We extend our heartfelt condolences to her entire family. Philip R. Cowen President The Harmonie Club 1/3
lead_paragraph: BALLON--Harriet. The Harmonie Club notes with sorrow the passing of our honored member Harriet Ballon. We extend our heartfelt condolences to her entire family. Philip R. Cowen President The Harmonie Club 1/3
